/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees on both sides, curves gently to the right, leading the viewer's eye towards a body of water in the distance. This water body is nestled amidst a lush expanse of greenery, creating a serene and tranquil atmosphere. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are green and gray, reflecting the natural and urban elements of the landscape.
